p: GitHub Docs Appinspect GitHub release (latest SemVer) Splunkbase App Splunk ES Compatibility CrowdStrike Intel Indicator TA Compatibility Splunk Cloud Compatibility Author LinkedIn
This supporting add-on Adds CrowdStrike's intelligence indicators to Splunk Enterprise Security's threat framework.
** This supporting add-on is only intended to work with Splunk Enterprise Security deployments **
Full documentation can be found at https://cs-intel.rba.community.

This Splunk Supporting Add-on is not affiliated with CrowdStrike, Inc. and is not sponsored or sanctioned by the CrowdStrike team. Please visit https://www.crowdstrike.com/ for more information about CrowdStrike.
No, this add-on does not contain views.
Please open an issue or feature request on Github.
